title: Most played PC games 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of playing time for 20 number of Video Games.
The Share of playing time is appeared to be the highest at Video Game League of Legends and lowest at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III.
The Share of playing time of Video Game League of Legends is 31.83% larger than the minimum value at Call of Duty: Black Ops III.
